name: Goblin Game
description:
Goblin Game is an open-world, goblin-themed stroll through an autumnal forest.

Music and sounds by Jack Attewell.

Avara by Velvetyne Type Foundry.

Features

  • ~5min playtime
  • goblin!
  • hand-crafted world
  • evolving soundtrack
  • interactive leaf particles
  • vibes
